concept.title: Elasticsearch
concept.shortdesc: The Elasticsearch destination writes data to an Elasticsearch cluster. The Elasticsearch destination writes each record to Elasticsearch as a document.

conbody.p: Elasticsearch destinationoverviewdestinationsElasticsearchWhen you configure the Elasticsearch destination, you configure the cluster name, node URI, and document-related information. You can add advanced Elasticsearch properties as needed.
By default, the Elasticsearch destination accesses the cluster through the node URI that you provide, then accesses other available nodes in the cluster.
